attributes.action: restrict the sale of pyrotecnics[Fireworks] to members of the public to the week prior to November the 5th ONLY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it would assist the local communities,
policing authorities, councils etc if
the sale of fireworks was restricted to
the period of one week before nov 5th,
and aleviate the noise disturbance caused by a minority before the 5th,
also it would cause less distress to
domestic pets.
